title: Knowledge Base Entry
description: Entry in the WebCompat Knowledge Base

title.description: Single-sentence title summarizing the issues cause

severity.description: Estimation of how severe this issue is

user_base_impact.description: Estimation of how many users are affected

notes.description: Additional information about the priority of the issue, including reasoning for the `severity` and `user_base_impact` settings, where that isn't obvious.

tags.description: List of tags to attached to this issue

symptoms.description: List of strings that describe how this bug manifests

console_messages.description: List of Developer Tools console messages associated with this issue

solutions.description: Collection of information on how this can be solved

interventions.description: List of URLs to interventions that are shipping or have been shipping. Link to the code in the GitHub repository, and use the canonical URLs to ensure persistance over time

notes.description: List of notes about previous solving attempts, etc

workarounds.description: List of descriptions of how web developers can work around the issue

references.description: Collection of references related to this issue

breakage.description: List of issues tracking known site breakage.

site.description: URL of broken site or page

items.description: List of affected platforms. Default is 'all'

last_reproduced.description: Most recent date the issue was successfully reproduced

intervention.description: URL of intervention that is shipping or has been shipped. Link to the code in the GitHub repository, and use the canonical URLs to ensure persistance over time

affects_users.description: What fraction of users are affected. 'all' where any site user is likely to run into the issue, 'some' for issues that are common but many users will not experience, and 'few' where the breakage depends on an unusual configuration or similar.

resolution.description: If the issue no longer reproduces on this site, the kind of change that happened. 'site_change' if there was a general redesign or the site is no longer online, 'site_fixed' if the specific issue was patched.

notes.description: Any additional notes about why the other fields for this issue are set to the given values.

platform_issues.description: List of URLs to issues tracking the underlying platform issue

telemetry.description: List of URLs pointing to telemetry data indicating how widespread this issue is. Link to Use Counters etc

testcases.description: List of URLs to testcases, or path to a directory inside this repository

standards_positions.description: List of URLs pointing to positions from Mozilla and other vendors on open Web and Web-related specifications submitted to standards bodies like the IETF, W3C, and Ecma TC39.

standards_discussions.description: List of URLs pointing to discussions on specifications or proposals submitted to standards bodies like the IETF, W3C, and Ecma TC39.
